about_the_game:
Dive into the realm of offline roguelike action RPG.
Dungero is RPG game with easy gameplay and fun loot mechanics.



GAME FEATURES
- Easy to play rogue-like action RPG
- A collection of immortal heroes to choose from in your journey
- Ranged and melee combat, providing diverse action
- Visit magical altars and learn powerful skills in this offline rogue-like adventure
- Deadly curses that change everything, adding depth to the gameplay
- Powerful bosses in various dungeons, challenging your skills
- Destructible objects, dangerous traps, interactive mechanisms in dungeons
- Loot legendary treasures, rare equipment, and craft artifacts in this rogue-like game
- Dozens of quests and events, providing endless content



STORY BEHIND
The inspiration for this game concept was a mix of our favorite games such as Curse of the Dead Gods, Diablo or the mobile game Archero. We wanted to use the individual elements of these games that we enjoy and use them to create a multi-platform game.
At the same time, we wanted to further support all the RPG elements we love. For this reason, we created a system of altars and signposts that allow you to choose a playstyle for a given game and character. We've added resource mining, crafting advanced items using blueprints, and a magical item sets.
We developed a system of "corruption", i.e. the principle of reward and punishment, so that the player always has a choice. He can either choose a procedure with a rapid increase in skills and bonuses, for which he is penalized more by random curses, or slower tactical leveling with a smaller penalty. The primary abilities of the characters also affect the gameplay, so each game is completely different.



ABOUT US
We are senior game developers, which started developing mobile games in 2009. To date, we have 18 mobile games on both iOS and Android platforms. The current game studio Retrobot based in the Czech Republic has 5 developer members. We make games because we enjoy it. We hope you will like our project.
